thread.title: Robert Schneider
thread.title_full: Sportbike Track Gear reviewed by Robert Schneider

author: Robert Schneider
title: Robert Schneider
text: Just bought a 2016 Aprilia RSV4 RF. I could not find a fender eliminator for this bike anywhere on the web. The factory license plate and turn signal indicator bracket could not be more "ugly" on this beautiful bike. So I made a call to STG. They didn't have a fender eliminator for this bike on their website, but they found one for me. I just installed it and it looks great.
